All Classes

Class Description
AmbientLight
this class represent a ambient light
Box
this class represent a box in with 6 corners of rectangle that create by polygons and the depth of the box
Camera
this class represent camera by location
and directions toward, right and up to the scene that lives in a virtual view plane.
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a Coordinate for Cartesian Coordinate system.
Cylinder
this a class represent a final Cylinder by radius, ray and height
DirectionalLight
Directional Light with constant light intensity and direction
Geometries
A class that represents all kinds of geometries
that have in common that they implement the interface of finding points of intersection with a ray.
Geometry
Abstract class for all the geometries shape.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
Intersectable
interface to get intersection points of ray with some geometry
Intersectable.GeoPoint
Helper class In order to get color for each geometry shape individually within a scene, we want to calculate color at a certain point for the geometry
Light
abstract class to generate light intensity for all kind of lights
LightSource
interface for light sources in some scene
Material
this class gives factors of material and the texture of the geometry.
Pixel
Pixel is an internal helper class whose objects are associated with a Render object that they are generated in scope of.
Plane
this class represent a Plane with point and vector normal that standing on the point
Point3D
this is a basic point for RayTracing project in 3D
PointLight
this class represent a point light like normal lamp.
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
Ray
this class represent a ray by starting point and direction
RayTracerBase
abstract class to rey tracing
RayTracerBasic
Rey tracer calculate the color ray-geometry intersection
Render
This class gets all the objects needed to create an image in our 3D graphic model
Scene
Graphic scene in our 3D model Scene contains geometric shapes and light sources we using the builder pattern design
Scene.SceneBuilder
builder pattern design
SceneDescriptor
Decodes the necessary values for a scene from the root of an element in an XML file
Sphere
this class represent a sphere by center point and radius
SpotLight
this class represent a spot light with direction and intensity of the light and also can make a flashlight by focusing the the light
Triangle
this class represent a Triangle by 3 points
Tube
this class represent an infinite Tube by radius and ray
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
this class represent a Vector of 3D
XmlParser
This file reads an xml file for a graphic scene in our 3D model
